article_title: Nurse Practitioners, Physician Assistants Near Prescribing Authority Florida

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Florida is on the verge of being the last of the nation's 50 states to grant nurse practitioners prescriptive authority for controlled substances like painkillers. Physician assistants would also get the ability to write such prescriptions
og.title: Nurse Practitioners, Physician Assistants Near Prescribing Authority Florida
